DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , parallel , double-blind , placebo control clinical trial evaluate effect functional yogurt powder bone health biomarkers menopause , middle-aged woman high risk osteoporosis . 78 volunteer recruit La Paz University Hospital Madrid . Participants meet next inclusion criterion : menopausal , age 50 65 year , IMC≥18.5 < 35 Kg/m2 diagnosis osteopenia without pharmacological treatment ( Volunteers without osteopenia diagnosis meet two next : dairy intake 2 serving day , sedentary lifestyle and/or smoker 5 cigarette day ) . Participants randomize two arm : 1 . Functional yogurt powder arm : receive 24 week daily serve functional yogurt powder contain Calcium , D , K , C vitamins , Zn , Mg , L-leucin Lactobacillus plantarum 3547 probiotic . 2 . Control yogurt powder arm : receive 24 week daily serve control yogurt powder ( enrich ) . All participant advise follow healthy diet practice physical activity . Follow include 3 individualized visit 4 group visit check product intake compliance tolerance product . The primary outcome , vitamin D level , measure beginning ( basal condition ) end intervention ( 24 week ) . Other bone health biomarkers ( Parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) calcium , phosphorus , calcitonin , osteocalcin , adrenocorticotropic hormone ( ACTH ) , osteopontin , osteoprotegerin , sclerostin , N-terminal telopeptide ( NTx ) C-terminal telopeptide CTx ) safety issue ( transaminase creatinine ) measure time point ( 0 24 week ) .
